jobDescription: Company Description#LI-DNIJob DescriptionAnalyze business flow/website features and underlying data, apply relevant Information Retrieval techniques, Data Mining methods and Machine Learning algorithms, and propose data analytics product. Implement algorithms for prediction and optimization. Create algorithms in relevant statistical inference, graph and network analysis, computer vision, and Natural Language Processing (NLP) with open source tools and libraries. Build and maintain code to develop Machine Learning pipeline. Populate HDFS, Hadoop with log from Kafka and data from SQL/MySQL/NoSQL production systems. Build Data Science infrastructure and integrate Machine Learning models into production system. Design and build data transformation, conversion and computation on Hadoop, Spark and other distributed Big Data Systems. Design and support effective storage and retrieval. Create and maintain data driven solutions to improve products and user experience.#LI-DNIQualificationsPhD in CS plus 2 years of experience, with Hadoop, Spark, MapReduce, Python, Scala, C++, MySQL, NoSQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Distributed Systems, Information Retrieval, Data Mining and Visualization. #LI-DNIAdditional Information﻿#LI-DNI Send Qualified Resumes to:  Jana Jensen, Senior Recruiting Specialist Ancestry.com Operations, Inc 153 Townsend Street, Suite 800 San Francisco, CA 94107﻿
